plot: A look at the problems associated with cocaine use, including the toll it takes, not only on the users themselves but on society in general.
title: Cocaine Blues
plot_es: A look at the problems associated with cocaine use, including the toll it takes, not only on the users themselves but on society in general.
plot_en: A look at the problems associated with cocaine use, including the toll it takes, not only on the users themselves but on society in general.
